title: PianoSound1 SoundEffect
description: This package includes a variety of real and virtual piano key, hammer, and sustain sounds. It can be used for instrument performance and instrument simulator development in games.
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/SAcPRZsymR8


This package includes a variety of real and virtual piano key, hammer, and sustain sounds. It can be used for instrument performance and instrument simulator development in games.

  • AtmosPiano 85Key
  • BalladPiano 85Key
  • DrivePiano 85Key
  • ElectricPiano 85Key
  • GrandPiano 85Key
  • HorrorPiano 85Key
  • JazzPiano 85Key
  • StagePiano 85Key
  • StandardPiano 85Key


Files.

  • AtmosPiano 85 ( MIDI : C3~C9 Octave)
  • BalladPiano 85 ( MIDI : C3~C9 Octave)
  • DrivePiano 85 ( MIDI : C3~C9 Octave)
  • ElectricPiano 85 ( MIDI : C3~C9 Octave)
  • GrandPiano 85 ( MIDI : C3~C9 Octave)
  • HorrorPiano 85 ( MIDI : C3~C9 Octave)
  • JazzPiano 85 ( MIDI : C3~C9 Octave)
  • StagePiano 85 ( MIDI : C3~C9 Octave)
  • StandardPiano 85 ( MIDI : C3~C9 Octave)

This asset package is safe from copyright claims and warnings on YouTube. You are free to use this product as you wish, including for commercial projects, without any issues.
